metadata.title: CVE-2022-43272 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
DCMTK v3.6.7 was discovered to contain a memory leak via theT_ASC_Association object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-43272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
libdcmtk12 - 3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
